CalEvent.Subject: Young Adults Dinner
CalEvent.Details:
At Dave & Lisa Lumbert's House
This event is for people ages 19-36. We will make our own pizza's and discuss what everyone is looking for to start a Young Adult Ministry at River Valley. Please call the church for more information 630-844-9115
CalEvent.Location: 645 St Christopher, Aurora IL

CalEvent.Subject: Dinner's For 8
CalEvent.Details: Mark your calendars...more information to come soon!
CalEvent.Location: Host Houses will be released soon

CalEvent.Subject: Gospel Brunch
CalEvent.Details: The Wheaton College Choir will be joining us for church this day. We will have a brunch/potluck, please bring a dish to pass. This will be during our normal church service, more details to come!
CalEvent.Location: River Valley Community Church

CalEvent.Location: 888 S. Edgelawn Dr., Unit 1731. Aurora, IL 60506

CalEvent.Subject: Stitches Of Love
CalEvent.Details:
If you are a sewer, crocheter, knitter, stitcher, etc. we would love for you to join us for a time of fellowship as we make items to donate to local ministries in Aurora and surrounding areas. You can also work on items for yourself or things you want to give to loved ones! We will pray over these items, and the people that will receive them, all while spending time getting to know each other better.
*If you do not know how to sew, crochet, or knit but would like to learn we would love to teach you!
If you have any questions contact the church office 630-844-9115.

CalEvent.Subject: Master's Touch Graduation
CalEvent.Details:
Master's Touch is a Bible-based; Christ centered resolution to the crisis of the broken life, facilitated by on-on-one discipleship/mentoring within the context of local church partners
A comprehensive 6-month residential, life transformation ministry for troubled men whose lives are out of control as a result of drugs, alcohol or some other destructive behavior pattern. The program helps them confront life-controlling problems and empowers them to change.
Come support and celebrate the men that have graduated from the program.
CalEvent.Location: Warehouse Church - 308 East Galena Boulevard, Aurora IL
